author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

As agreed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47924, these storage protocols are obsolete.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47924
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1363

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Remove support for gsiftp:, sfn:, storm:, storm-lcg:, and lstore: protocols as obsolete
